summary: The September 11 attacks were the worst terrorist attacks ever, killing nearly 3,000 people. Two planes hit the World Trade Center in New York City, causing the buildings to collapse and most of the deaths. Other planes hit the Pentagon in Virginia and crashed in Pennsylvania. Most of the victims were civilians, but also included firefighters, police officers, and military personnel. Many people were also injured, and some have gotten sick from the dust at the World Trade Center site. These attacks affected people from all over the world.
title: Casualties of the September 11 attacks
